name: Contribute / 写文章
brief: 写文章一款用户投稿的功能，可代替BBS，可作为博客，可作为自媒体平台，只要你能想到请随意扩展，预留大量钩子，可单独对每个栏目设置投稿。站点数据超过50万，安装数据表容易出错，请联系官方付费处理。User posts, Can replace BBS, can be used as a blog, can be used as a self-media platform, please feel free to expand as long as you can think of, reserve a lot of hooks, Submission can be set for each column. If the data exceeds 500,000, the installation is prone to errors, please contact the official for payment processing :: Email:wellcms@qq.com
